verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shramalanu ponde shree Yesudu Nee korakai siluvalo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sadayudu preminche shatruvaina ninnu Doorastuda vaina nee yedala daya choopinche Vahiyinche nee shaapam bhariyinche Nee paapam nee manassu maarchu konina Santasinchunu prabhu Yesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dongavai neevunnaa durithambu lennunnaa Doshamubula kshamiyinchu thana siluva rakhtamutho Therachenugaa nee koraku Paraloka dwaaramu nemmadi Nitchunu neeku Yesuni viswasinchina{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Evaresu rakhtamulo kadugabadedaro Vaare cheredaru thana sanghamu nandu Angeekarinchumu Yesunu neevu Kaliginchu neeku thruptini Nede neevaayananu vedu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Siluvapai Yesu sarva marpinche Nee rakshana koraku krayamu Chellinche Yesunaku neevu Emiyyagalavu ? theruvu nee hrudaya Dwaaramunu nede praveshinchunu thaanu{/lang-eng}
